```js
$ mkdir –p .tmp/js
$ cd app/js
$ browserify main.js -o ../../.tmp/js/app.js

```

```js
$ mkdir –p .tmp/js
$ cd app/js
$ browserify main.js -o ../../.tmp/js/app.js

```

```js
$ npm install --save-dev jstify

```

```js
$ browserify main.js -t [ jstify --engine underscore ] -o ../../.tmp/js/app.js

```
